tasks.title: Proposed solution
tasks.description: Rewrite or adapt the coralph-init script to use PowerShell Core as the primary implementation, matching the behavior and compatibility of the 'just' configuration. PowerShell Core should be the preferred solution for initialization, ensuring consistent setup across Linux, macOS, and Windows Update README.md quickstart

tasks.issueTitle: feat: coralph-init should use PowerShell Core for cross-platform compatibility
tasks.title: Alternatives considered
tasks.description: Continue to provide a bash version for environments where PowerShell Core is not available, but prioritize PowerShell Core as default. Investigate using another cross-platform shell or scripting format, but PowerShell Core should be favored given its current adoption in the repo
